items.title: For Trump Administration, Fighting Crime Takes a Backseat to Immigration Arrests
items.description: “It’s a good time to be an American-born criminal,” said one expert, as ICE’s dragnet now includes thousands of agents from other federal law enforcem...

items.title: When the ‘Diddy’ Case Hits Home
items.description: As a kid, Joseph Wilson was sexually exploited by someone who was supposed to take care of him. The trial of Sean “Diddy” Combs resurfaced old wounds.

items.title: Rare Oversight Begins at Hinds County’s Raymond Detention Center in Mississippi
items.description: After a decade-long court battle, receiver Wendell M. France takes the reins.

items.title: The Marshall Project, St. Louis Public Radio and APM Reports Win 2025 Sunshine Award
items.description: The outlets are honored for their series on unsolved homicides by St. Louis Police Department, victims and families without justice.

items.title: In ICE Detention, Rising Deaths and Neglect: ‘They Wouldn’t Really Do Anything’
items.description: Recent incidents include a man who died awaiting surgery in Georgia and a woman’s miscarriage in California. Meanwhile, suicide attempts are rising.
